bug.summary: There is a bug in Examples/VisualBanana Scene
bug.description:
Describe the bug A clear and concise description of what the bug is. In "BananaLogic.cs", the "respawn" part cause all the banana respawn in the first Area. The setting of new banana position should add the code below.
"+ myArea.transform.position;"
To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Using mlagent to train VisualBanana Agent will found that the second bananaArea will end up with no banana.
Screenshots If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. Environment (please complete the following information):
OS + version: Windows 10 ML-Agents version:ML-Agents v0.8 Environment: VisualBanana
